name: Dive! (Tigermon)
description:
"Dive!" is an arcadelike game. Dodge fish, pick up hearts and oxygen, try your best on a high score and repeat. The game has 4 different types of Fish which have different names, swimspeeds and make a different amount of damage. But the Fish aren't the only difficulty...

While dodging the fish you are (like you probably tought) underwater. So you have to prevent your oxygentank from geting empty by picking up oxygen while dodging the different kinds of fish.

I hope you enjoy the game and have a lot of fun!
